snippet: An undercover investigation by the Humane Society found unsanitary and “inhumane” conditions at a Gettysburg, Pa., farm that supplies eggs to Costco.
abstract: Humane Society investigation discovers unsanitary and inhumane conditions at Gettysburg, Pa, farm operated by Hillandale Farms; facility supplies eggs to Costco, which has not yet responded to Human Society's call for timeline for its transition to cage-free eggs.
lead_paragraph: An undercover investigation by the Humane Society found unsanitary and “inhumane” conditions at a Gettysburg, Pa., farm that supplies eggs to Costco.

headline.main: ‘Inhumane’ Conditions Found at Egg Supplier for Costco
headline.print_headline: ‘Inhumane’ Conditions Found at Egg Supplier for Costco

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Humane Society of the United States
